trans-unit.source: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) Target player can't cast spells this turn. If this spell was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.
trans-unit.target: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) Target player can't cast spells this turn. If this spell was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.

trans-unit.source: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.) Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.
trans-unit.target: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.) Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

trans-unit.source: You may reveal a creature or land card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.
trans-unit.target: You may reveal a creature or land card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.
